channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KS

item.title: Report X-2023091010
item.description:
Report X-2023091010

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-20T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-19
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE MANAGER NOTIFIED QA OF THE LEAKING PACKAGE. QA PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED TOTE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TAKEN TO THE PROCESSING CAGE. DescribePack: ONE BOTTLE HAD A LOOSE CAP AND LEAKED OUT SOILING THE BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: MANAGER NOTICED THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING AND NOTIFIED QA. QA PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED TOTE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TAKEN TO THE PROCESSING CAGE. DescribePack: BOTH BOTTLES WERE LEAKING OUT FROM AROUND THE CAPS. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED INA LINED TOTE.

item.title: Report X-2023090985
item.description:
Report X-2023090985

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-20T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-19
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WHILE THE PACKAGE HANDLERS WERE LOADING THE TRAILER, THEY NOTICED THIS PACKAGE WAS LEAKING AND HAD A STRONG ODOR. THEY INFORMED THE MANAGER OF THE SITUATION. QA RUSHED OVER TO THE AREA AND FOUND THE PACKAGE AND NOTICED THE PACKAGE HAD NO HAZMAT LABEL ON THE OUTSIDE AND PLACED IT IN THE TOTE LINED WITH A HAZMAT BAG. ONCE IT WAS CONTAINED, THEY BROUGHT IT BACK AND PLACED IN THE VENTILATOR. DescribePack: FIVE OF THE BOTTLES ARE CRUSHED IN THE SIDE FROM BEING DROPPED. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A TOTE LINED WITH A HAZMAT BAG.

item.title: Report X-2023090819
item.description:
Report X-2023090819

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-20T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-19
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: HAZMAT BOXES WAS UNLOADED FROM A TRUCK IN THE DMP. ONE OF THE BOXES ON THE PALET WAS LEAKING. THE BOX HAD SHIPPING PAPERS AND A FLAMMABLE LIQUID DIAMOND LABEL. UPON CLEAN UP RESPONDER FOUND THE BOX HAD 4 BOTTLES INSIDE THAT HAD CAPS THAT WERE LOOSE. RESPONDER RESPONDED TO THE BOX BY PLACING IT IN A LINED SPILL TUB AND BEGINNING THE PROCESS OF DISPOSING OF IT PROPERLY THROUGH THE DMP.

item.title: Report X-2023090809
item.description:
Report X-2023090809

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-20T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-19
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A LEAKING PACKAGE WITH FULL PPE ON. USING THE DECISION TREE, THE RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE LEAKER AND PLACED ALL MATERIAL IN A LINED SPILL TUB. THE RESPONDER TRANSPORTED THE MATERIAL TO DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. UPON ARIVAL RESPONDER NOTED THAT ONE 5 GALLON PLASTIC BUCKET HAD A SMALL CRACK IN THE TOP. ALL MATERIAL WAS DISPOSED OF THOUGH DMP.

item.title: Report X-2023090923
item.description:
Report X-2023090923

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-19T15:12:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-16
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was placed upside down in trailer forcing liquid through the lid. Package was discovered in the unload and was placed in a plastic lined tote. DescribePack: Liquid leaked through the cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was placed in a plastic lined tote and placed in the hazmat cage for processing.
